text: Hi there, I'm Farrah and I live in Atlanta, Georgia. I live with my husband and my two kids. Well, one of my kids is in college, so he is not too far away, about 30 minutes, so we get to see him often. And my daughter is a junior in, no, a senior in high school, I keep saying junior. She's starting her senior year in just about a month or two. And yeah, so we're a family of four and we live in a single family home here in Atlanta, Georgia. And I work in sports and we are just a busy family. We just got back from vacation, so happy to be here. Thanks for having me.
